transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Madam maine Meena Trader pe call kiya tha sir se baat karne ke liye Sai Baba abhi unhone mujhe call kiya tha.
Executive: 542 number kiske pass hai 542 number?
Customer: 542 number.
Executive: Ha yes.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Customer: Sir se baat karne the sir ne bhi call kiya tha mujhe unko baat karne the discuss karne the Sai Baba ji se.
Executive: Sir sir se baat karne ka hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Abhi unhone mujhe call bhi kiya tha.
Customer: Inquiry ka problem hai mujhe boliye aap.
Customer: Ha inquiry ka problem hai yes.
Customer: To inquiry kitne samay se calls nahi aa rahe wo just janna chah raha tha aur message.
Customer: Hame call nahi aa raha.
Executive: Call nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Call nahi aa rahe inquiry nahi kar rahe kyun.
Executive: Achcha theek hai to abhi lead to hai waise inquiry call se matlab specific to kyunki lead to hum dekh rahe hain 27 leads pending hai aapke catalog mein 27 lead hai abhi buyleads.
Executive: Aur inquiry inquiry to mam buyer oriented hai na that means wo depend karta hai ki buyer aapke profile pe aaye ki nahi but 27 leads abhi aapke catalog mein available hai.
Customer: 27 leads.
Executive: 27 leads hai ha.
Executive: Abhi bhi available hai aap login karenge IndiaMART.
Customer: Inquiry inquiry kyun nahi aa rahe abhi tak.
Executive: Inquiry matlab wo direct calls aate uski baat kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Inquiry bhi aaya nahi aaj.
Executive: Achcha aaj call nahi kyunki buyer ne search nahi kiya hoga isliye nahi aaya hoga.
Executive: Inquiry to buyer oriented hoti hai sir.
Executive: Kal ek call kiya tha aapko yaad hoga 10 tarikh ko to.
Customer: Theek hai mera side mein koi issue nahi.
Executive: Nahi isme koi issue nahi hai issue main aapko bas kal ek do baar isliye connect kar raha tha na kyunki dekho do teen cheeze aisi hai na jo ki mujhe change karne the edit karne the.
Executive: Thodi si detail kam hai us pe aap bata do mujhe.
Customer: Jaise jaise ye star anees hai theek hai sun rahe ho.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na to star anees ka quality grade kya hai aapke pass quality grade.
Customer: Autumn crop hai matlab standard quality spring crop autumn crop I think standard quality hoga ye.
Executive: Sir aap video meet pe join ha boliye.
Customer: Aap update karta main karna.
Executive: Ha main aapse puch ke hi karunga isliye main aapse puch raha hu matlab quality standard quality mein mention kar du.
Customer: Ha okay quality matlab autumn autumn.
Executive: Ha autumn na wahi main puch raha quality matlab autumn theek hai ye dal diya maine theek hai aur iska minimum quantity 10 kg mein add kar du ya kitna karu.
Customer: Ha 50 kg kar do.
Executive: Aur abhi kis cheez ka jyada season chal raha hai aapko inquiry kis cheez se jyada chahiye ye bataiye.
Customer: Theek hai kar do 10 kilo kar do.
Executive: Theek hai aur inquiry kis cheez ka aapko jyada chahiye ye to bataiye matlab kaju ka ya fir kis ka almond ka.
Customer: Almond pista sab cheez hona hai sir mere ko.
Customer: Main pura karna hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai almond pista ka matlab jyadatar karna achcha pura matlab jo jo edit karne kiya theek hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Okay aur dealing area local hai ya pan India hai.
Customer: Actually main 90% business local mein kar raha hu remaining pan India mein kar raha hu pan India mein theek hai main kam local mein hai Andhra mein.
Executive: Okay aur main ka matlab local ka baat karu to jyadatar kis cheez ka dispatch karte ho aap supply karte ho local ke liye inquiry.
Customer: Local ke liye inquiry.
Executive: Matlab ha jyadatar kis mein deal karte hai cashews nuts mein almonds mein California almonds mein.
Customer: Sab cheez karega sir pura sab cheez karega main.
Executive: Okay sab cheez karenge na matlab koi dikkat nahi hai theek hai ek second ruk jao.
Executive: Aur aap na ek do calls miss kar rahe ho aap agar aap dekhoge to kal aapne call miss kiya tha buyer ka baat kiya tha aapne usse.
Customer: Kiya but main uthane ke baad wo band kiya.
Executive: Achcha theek hai.
Executive: To aap tracking kar leta na calls ka matlab dikhta aapko jo call chhutta hai to ya main batau lead manager mein ja ke aapne matlab call pata karte ho ki jo call chuti hai kahan dekhte ho wapas se usko.
Customer: [inaudible] nahi.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: [inaudible] list nahi kar rahe phone.
Executive: Achcha receive nahi kar rahe.
Customer: Nahi kar raha.
Executive: Achcha to wapas se lagaiye kyunki agar usne call kiya to jarur usko kuch requirement hai na tabhi to usne call kiya aap naye number se laga liya kijiye.
Customer: Wo baat nahi hai sir do ring aake cut ho ja raha puche to agar do teen baar karne ke baad puche to bhi aaya madam bol rahe hain.
Executive: Achcha theek hai agar jyada aisa problem hoga na to bataiyega theek hai ek do hoga to theek hai agar aapko baar baar matlab nahi sir aaj subah se ek bhi call nahi aaya IndiaMART mein.
Executive: Aayega madam call call dekhiye call kaise hota hai main aapko wo bata raha hu jab buyer search karte hai na to wo aapke website pe aate hai to agar may bhi aaj searches nahi bana ho logo ne search nahi kiya ho jab search karenge to aapka profile top pe dikhta hai waha pe top pe dikhega to obviously aapko log call karte hai tabhi to aapko call jyada jati hai to ye sab buyer oriented hai.
Customer: Hamara puchne ka matlab ye hai ki hamare website mein kuch problem hai kya bolke.
Executive: Nahi nahi kuch kuch kami nahi hai kuch kami nahi hai aapke website mein main dekh raha hu mera naam Raju Prajapati mera number likh lo pehle aap aap mera personal number likh lijiye jab bhi dikat hoga mujhe call kijiyega number likhiye.
Customer: Ek minute sir ha.
Customer: Actually mere ko jyada inquiry aana jyada calls aana hai isliye main premium le liya.
Executive: Milega milega dekho business IndiaMART se mil jayega achcha milega business main matlab main dekh raha hu catalog aapka aapke product mein na expected calls inquiries nahi aa raha hai kam aa raha hai pura.
Customer: Kam aa raha hai pehle wo monthly monthly plan running hai na wo plan mein kaisa aega wo abhi bhi aega aa raha hai jyada nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha abhi aapka TrustSeal chal raha hai abhi aapka TrustSeal chal raha hai na do saal ka yaad hoga to aapko.
Customer: Ha ha February mein aapne liya tha na to call jyada aate hai na ha call jyada aate hai local ki local ke call jyada aate hai.
Customer: Nahi aa rahe hain ji isliye phone kiya na aapko phone karta hai aapko main.
Executive: Theek hai mujhe thoda sa ye karne dijiye isme matlab kuch main product mein changes kar raha hu theek hai jo jo cheez chuti hai na matlab bahut sare product mein origin chuta hai quality chuta hai to main apne hisab se isko detailing kar deta hu jo jo chute hai.
Executive: Aur aap matlab next ek week tak observe kijiyega kitne calls aa rahe hai theek hai aaj se leke aaj 11 tarikh hai na 18 19 20 tak matlab dekhiyega kitna call gaya theek hai fir main baat karunga aapse wapas se filhal aap mera number likh lijiye.
Customer: Okay boliye.
Executive: Number bolu.
Customer: Ha bolna.
Executive: 8340
Customer: 8340
Executive: 16
Customer: 16
Executive: 6817
Customer: 166817 ha Raju Prajapati R A J U P R A J A P A T I.
Customer: Ek minute number confirm kijiye 834016 ha 6817 ji bilkul.
Customer: Raju Prajapati ha Raju Prajapati to aap na mere se matlab touch mein rahiye theek hai.
Customer: Ji aap thoda hamara wo calls aaye jaisa kijiye isliye main aapko call kar raha tha na kuch yaad hoga maine aapse baat bhi kiya tha keh rahe the ki sir se baat karaiye remember.
Customer: Ji ji ji ha to jab main call karta hu to obviously kuch matlab kaam ke liye karta hu aur important hota hai wo kyunki details wagera jab mujhe dikhta hai na ki kuch cheeze missing hai to main aapko call karta hu janne ke liye ki kya hai theek hai to call uthaya kijiyega na baki inquiry aapka sahi ho jayega main track pe la dunga aur aapne jo concern raise kiya na ek feedback mil jayega theek hai us pe aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega theek hai ha ji ji dhanyavad theek hai theek hai dhanyavad madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving expected calls and inquiries.

- Website may have issues.

- Calls are not being received.



Resolution:

- Executive will check and correct product details.

- Provided personal number for direct contact.

- Asked to observe calls for a week.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to observe calls for a week.

- Executive will call back after a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, calls, catalog, trustseal
